name: Proxy
description: a connection representation to a simple HTTP proxy

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: hostname
attributes.description: The hostname or IP-address of the proxy

attributes.name: port
attributes.description: The port of the proxy. If not set the default will be 8888 (Telerik Fiddler Proxy)

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: The username to authenticate at the proxy if the proxy requires authentication

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: The password to authenticate at the proxy if the proxy requires authentication
